item.title: Bangkok Trip Day 0
item.description: Got to the airport early. Bought SIM card in the plane! (EXTREMELY CONVENIENT for 299Baht!!) Forgot that Singaporean passport still need to…
item.content:encoded:
1. Got to the airport early.
  2. Bought SIM card in the plane! (EXTREMELY CONVENIENT for 299Baht!!)
  3. Forgot that Singaporean passport still need to fill up immigration card. Passed the opportunity while on the plane (YIKES). Could have shaved off about 10-15mins.
  4. Took a Grab to accomodation.
  5. Place is nice but soap ran out and there’s a couple of annoying mosquitoes (YIKES).
  6. Preparation for Chatuchak weekend market later!

Just a quick and dirty draft. More pictures will come again later!

For now, nights.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: 1st attempt at trying out ReactJS + GatsbyJS + Github Pages for blogging! Gatsby Documentation Gatsby Starter Blog Gatsby with Github Pages…
item.content:encoded:
1st attempt at trying out ReactJS + GatsbyJS + Github Pages for blogging!

  1. Gatsby Documentation
  2. Gatsby Starter Blog
  3. Gatsby with Github Pages

Gatsby purely uses markdown for blog posts.

CSS are used too, of course. But that is a concern for another day.

For now, a simple blogging platform would do.
